name: find_extreme_values
description: Finds the minimum or maximum value of a specific curve (e.g., GR, POR, RHOB) within a specified depth range. Essential for identifying purest lithology intervals (min GR) or tightest streaks.

curve_name.description: The mnemonic of the curve to analyze (e.g., 'GR', 'NPHI', 'RHOB').

mode.description: Whether to find the minimum or maximum value. Default is 'min'.

start_depth.description: Optional start depth for the analysis window.

end_depth.description: Optional end depth for the analysis window.
